name: Metacritic guesser
description:
This small minigame was created in 3 days, you get 3 random games and 3 reviews. you have to guess the real game by its reviews. Good luck!

[READ THIS!]

If you get long load times or underwhelming reviews you can change the char limit on the "config.txt" file which comes included.

[HOW DO I ADD MY OWN GAMES?]

If you want to add your own games to the list of used games,

1. Open the "Add_Games_Here" folder

2. Get to the Metacritic website : https://www.metacritic.com/game/playstation-4

3. [IMPORTANT NOTE!] you can only use ps4 games so make sure your url has "playstation-4" in it

4. Copy the url from your metacritic game, Example : https://www.metacritic.com/game/playstation-4/red-dead-redemption-2

now that you have the url copy only the name from it Example : instead of the link above copy only the name : " red-dead-redemption-2"

5. Open "GameAdder.exe" in the folder, paste the name and add line! you're done!

[Bugs]

don't do anything while its loading or it will load forever
